Cincinnati.Cincinnati: Cincinnati ( SIN-sih-NAT-ee) is a city in the U.S. state of Ohio and seat of Hamilton County. Settled 1788, the city was located at the north side of the confluence of the Licking River to the Ohio. The city drives the Cincinnati–Middletown–Wilmington combined statistical area, which had a population of 2,172,191 in the 2010 census.
